name: A Desert of Ghosts
description:
Welcome To: A Desert of Ghosts

A Desert of Ghosts is a single player western adventure game that is a cross between an action game and a walking simulator. It takes place in a wild west setting similar to that of Red Dead Redemption. The player is a Cowboy that has run out of supplies and their horse has run off, the player then has to decide what direction he wants to go in, find the horse, or go in another direction all the while they become more and more dehydrated from the lack of water and the immense heat.

Controls:

- WASD to move.

- Mouse to aim camera.

- Hold left click to aim revolver.

- Right click to shoot revolver.
